media:group.media:title: Mutations and the First Replicators
media:group.media:description:
In this video, we see how mutations can lead from simple replicators to complex organisms. The third in a series on evolution.

Made with Blender and python.

More on RNA as the first replicator: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RNA_world

Special thanks to supporters on Patreon, especially:

Several other inputs into the graphics are from public domain contributions to https://www.blendswap.com.
